meanings.definition: To give an account of in speech or writing
meanings.sent1: Can you describe what the movie was about?
meanings.sent2: She will describe her trip to the beach in her journal.
meanings.sent3: The parrot tried to describe the movie plot to its owner.
meanings.sent4: Her words painted a vivid picture as she described the sunset.
meanings.sent5: He used colorful language to describe the taste of the exotic fruit.

meanings.definition: To represent or give an account of in words
meanings.sent1: Please describe the character's appearance in the story.
meanings.sent2: The witness will describe the suspect to the police.
meanings.sent3: The comedian tried to describe the joke to the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her smile described her happiness better than any words could.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brushstrokes described the beauty of the landscape.

meanings.sent1: The map will describe the route we need to take.
meanings.sent2: He will describe the shape of the cloud to his friend.
meanings.sent3: The child tried to describe the shape of the cookie in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The dancer's movements described a graceful arc in the air.
meanings.sent5: The architect's blueprint accurately described the layout of the building.
